recommendation.Face_shape_defination: The face shape appears to be oval, with forehead, cheekbones, and jawline tapering gently.
recommendation.Facial_structure_defination: Prominent cheekbones and well-proportioned features contributing to a harmonious face.
recommendation.HairStyle_defination: Short, curly hair that appears healthy with no visible signs of thinning.
recommendation.Skin_Quality_defination: Skin looks generally clear and smooth without visible roughness or burns.
